description: Partitions encoded by prime factorization. The partition [P1+P2+P3+...] with P1>=P2>=P3>=... is encoded as 2^P1 * 3^P2 * 5^P3 *...
comments: Partitions are ordered first by sum, then lexicographically: [] [1] [2] [1+1] [3] [2+1] [1+1+1] [4]... Rearrangement of A025487, A036035 etc.
author: _Marc LeBrun_, Feb 07 2001
